title: Filmmaker Delores Thornton (Ida Mae 2)

description: In an epic edition of Film Soceyology, Matthew Socey interviews local filmmaker Delores Thornton (Ida Mae 2), dips into the archives with musician Michael Doucet about Louisiana films, reviews Cyrano and then Grab a pencil...
